t2.Vengeful Curse: When hit by an enemy, attacker's DMG is reduced by 70% for 3 sec. This effect only activates once in 40 sec, and cannot be dispelled.
t2.Goddess Blessing: Increases all allies’ Crit Chance by 90. If another ally has the same perk, only an additional 45 applies.
t2.Inner Peace: All allies recover 1% HP per sec and gain 60 CC Resist. If another ally has the same perk, only an additional 0.5% HP recovery per sec and 30 CC Resist apply.
t2.Blessing of Mana: Increases Mana Recovery per sec by 30%.
t2.Swiftness: Increases all allies’ ATK Speed by 60. If another ally has the same perk, only an additional 30 applies.
